title: The One for Me
description: New York Times Bestselling author Corinne Michaels brings a new sweet and endearing love story to life in the third STANDALONE in the Arrowood Brothers series. Four brothers are forced to face their past in this small town they all escaped and see if love can overcome all odds. Sean has loved Devney since he was six years old, but never told her. Now, she’s going to marry someone else … can he stand by and let her go or will he finally risk it all?Synopsis Coming Soon
author: Corinne Michaels
